thread.title: Singing is as easy as 1, 2, 3 for new Cap Coast business
thread.title_full: Singing is as easy as 1, 2, 3 for new Cap Coast business

title: Singing is as easy as 1, 2, 3 for new Cap Coast business
text:
Singing is as easy as 1, 2, 3 for new Cap Coast business Amy Haydock | 3rd Oct 2015 6:00 AM Amy Haydock MUSICAL MIND: Yeppoonâ€™s Narelle Schirmer has just officially opened Facets Music and Performing Arts Studio in James St. Amy Haydock ROK Local Real Estate Cars For Sale 
WHILE there are many facets to performing arts, there are just as many facets to Narelle Schirmer. 
That's why she decided to call her new business Facets Music and Performing Art Studio, opening this week where she teaches singing, vocal coaching, guitar, piano, drama and even make-up for film and TV. 
Singing for the last 40 years across the country and currently gigging locally, Narelle, who also has a Bachelor of Music, said her love for teaching was to give children and adults a voice to express themselves. 
"They have something to say but may not want to say it on a football field," she said. 
"It's an extraordinary experience. 
"I've wanted to be a teacher since I was five. 
"But you've got to have excellent communication and speak to children with encouragement because every one of them is different." 
With the belief that "singing is as easy as breathing", Narelle said it took only seconds to choose the space on James St. 
"As soon as I walked in the acoustics were perfect so I knew I had to have it," she said. 
"I want this to be a community meeting place. 
"We also have group drama lessons here, a percussion group and choir group who meet here once a month as well." MORE INFO WHERE: Upstairs at 44 James St WHAT: Singing, vocal coaching, guitar, piano, drama lessons and more Contact Narelle on 0429832727 to book or email facets22@outlook.com capricorn coast
